Headline: #87 87th Temporary Reroute at 87th Street/St. Lawrence
ShortDescription: 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted near 87th Street/St. Lawrence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 87th, Cottage Grove, 90th, King Drive, 87th, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near 87th Street/St. Lawrence.

Allow extra travel time.
